dmca.title: FW: serious concerns
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. copyright and spamming Added by system at Monday, Jan 15 2007 11:38 am X-MailFrom: info@milesfaster.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.10] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for <abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Jan 15 11:38:26 2007 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 15 Jan 2007 11:36:46 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 15 Jan 2007 11:36:43 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1168882602-26413-345-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from dedi.milesfaster.co.uk (dedi.milesfaster.co.uk [81.29.66.120]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 4953E5FD9F for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Mon, 15 Jan 2007 11:36:43 -0600 (CST) Received: from host86-129-65-27.range86-129.btcentralplus.com ([86.129.65.27] helo=mainpc) by dedi.milesfaster.co.uk with esmtpa (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from <info@milesfaster.co.uk>) id 1H6Vky-0002H6-Jw; Mon, 15 Jan 2007 17:36:28 +0000 Message-ID: <033101c738cb$b2cf8710$0202a8c0@mainpc> From: "Milesfaster.co.uk" <info@milesfaster.co.uk> To: <domainregistrar@register.com>, <walt@zuvio.com>, <webmaster@ebusiness-sap.com>, <abuse@ev1servers.net>, <webmaster@pgdlondon.org> X-ASG-Orig-Subj: copyright and spamming Subject: copyright and spamming Date: Mon, 15 Jan 2007 17:32:09 -0000 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_02CE_01C738CB.15C2E840" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - dedi.milesfaster.co.uk X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - milesfaster.co.uk X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: info@milesfaster.co.uk X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Jan 2007 17:36:43.0596 (UTC) FILETIME=[B8F578C0:01C738CB] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs You are running a spam doorway redirecting website called www.pgdlondon.org. You have used copyright pages in their entirety from milesfaster.co.uk as content for search engines and you then redirect for real visitors. This is a copyright and intellectual property infringement. We request you to remove all pages IMMEDIATELY that use our content. For example: http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=22666&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pgdlond on.org%2Fheathrow-hotels.html&t=1168881653&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mi lesfaster.co.uk%2Fheathrow-hotels-london.htm&w=57&c=1 PLus the others you have ripped. If you do not take these pages down we will formally issue a DMCA notice on you, your hosts and to all major search engines. We will then look to recover damages for the theft. Your co-operation at an early stage would be appreciated. Alan Ross milesfaster.co.uk +44 208 346 8166 MIME element (text/html) <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN"> <HTML><HEAD> <META http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1"> <META content="MSHTML 6.00.5730.11" name=GENERATOR> <STYLE></STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY bgColor=#ffffff> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>Dear Sirs</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>You are running a spam doorway redirecting website called <A href="http://www.pgdlondon.org">www.pgdlondon.org</A>.<BR> ;You have used copyright pages in their entirety from milesfaster.co.uk as content for search engines and you then redirect for real visitors. This is a copyright and intellectual property infringement. We request you to remove all pages IMMEDIATELY that use our content. For example:</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2><A href="http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=22666&u=http%3A%2F%2Fw ww.pgdlondon.org%2Fheathrow-hotels.html&t=1168881653&s=h ttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.milesfaster.co.uk%2Fheathrow-hotels-london.htm&w =57&c=1">http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=22666&u= http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pgdlondon.org%2Fheathrow-hotels.html&t=11688816 53&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.milesfaster.co.uk%2Fheathrow-hotels-london .htm&w=57&c=1</A></FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2></FONT> </DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>PLus the others you have ripped. If you do not take these pages down we will formally issue a DMCA notice on you, your hosts and to all major search engines. We will then look to recover damages for the theft. Your co-operation at an early stage would be appreciated.</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2></FONT> </DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>Alan Ross</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>milesfaster.co.uk</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>+44 208 346 8166</FONT></DIV></BODY></HTML> MIME element (text/plain) 3. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs You are running a spam doorway redirecting website called www.pgdlondon.org. You have used copyright pages in their entirety from milesfaster.co.uk as content for search engines and you then redirect for real visitors. This is a copyright and intellectual property infringement. We request you to remove all pages IMMEDIATELY that use our content. For example: http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=22666&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pgdlond on.org%2Fheathrow-hotels.html&t=1168881653&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mi lesfaster.co.uk%2Fheathrow-hotels-london.htm&w=57&c=1 PLus the others you have ripped. If you do not take these pages down we will formally issue a DMCA notice on you, your hosts and to all major search engines. We will then look to recover damages for the theft. Your co-operation at an early stage would be appreciated. Alan Ross milesfaster.co.uk +44 208 346 8166 MIME element (text/html) <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN"> <HTML><HEAD> <META http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1"> <META content="MSHTML 6.00.5730.11" name=GENERATOR> <STYLE></STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY bgColor=#ffffff> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>Dear Sirs</FONT></DIV> <DIV><FONT face=Verdana size=2>You are running a spam doorway redirecting website called <A href="http://www.pgdlondon.org">www.pgdlondon.org</A>.<BR> ;You have used copyright pages in their entirety from milesfaster.co.uk as content for search engines and you then redirect for real visitors. Dear Sirs
You are running a spam doorway redirecting website called www.pgdlondon.org.
You have used copyright pages in their entirety from milesfaster.co.uk as content for search engines and you then redirect for real visitors. This is a copyright and intellectual property infringement. We request you to remove all pages IMMEDIATELY that use our content. For example:
htt p://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=22666&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pgdlondon. org%2Fheathrow-hotels.html&t=1168881653&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.miles faster.co.uk%2Fheathrow-hotels-london.htm&w=57&c=1
 
PLus the others you have ripped. If you do not take these pages down we will formally issue a DMCA notice on you, your hosts and to all major search engines. We will then look to recover damages for the theft. Your co-operation at an early stage would be appreciated.
 
Alan Ross
milesfaster.co.uk
+44 208 346 8166
MIME element (text/plain) Copyright wrote: > Have we processed it? which case reference is he talking about? > > ________________________________ > > From: Milesfaster.co.uk [mailto:info@milesfaster.co.uk] > Sent: Tuesday, January 23, 2007 3:55 PM > To: Copyright > Subject: serious concerns > > > Dear Sirs we have previously emailed you regarding websites on your > servers that are ripping our content. We have requested the content be > removed. The last contact was > Reference: [ThePlanet-C2586084S] > > We have now identified further sites that are ripping our content and > hosted on your servers. You have not replied to our first contact. As > this has become a big problem for us and concerns more than one site > will proceed with action for damages against yourselves unless we hear > back from you within 7 days. Our latest complaint is with this site: > > the text on > http://www.gtahotels.com/hotels/kensington_close_hotel_london.htm > The Kensington Close Hotel London is situated in a relatively quiet > side street off of Kensington High Street, this is one of the busiest > shopping areas in central London famous for its upmarket style. This > is a central location close to Hyde Park and is close to the main > commuter route into and out of London (A4), giving good road links to > Heathrow Airport and out to the West of England. The Kensington Close > Hotel is a modern hotel in one of London's most historic boroughs. > > > is taken from > http://209.85.135.104/search?q=cache:http://www.milesfaster.co.uk/lond > on > -hotels/kensington-close-hotel.htm&ie=UTF-8 > > We hope to hear that you have taken the page down. > > Alan Ross > milesfgaster.co.uk > 02083468166 > * Unknown Key * 0x067C2882(L)
